episode_summary: In this episode, D.J. Paris shares insights on how top real estate agents utilize AI to enhance their business strategies. He provides actionable tactics for improving lead conversion, managing time effectively, and handling sales objections. The discussion also highlights the importance of defining expert roles in AI queries to achieve specific business goals.
